<!-- Edit your panel content directly in the HTML below. You can use text and <img> tags. -->


```{=html}
<div id="sheet">
  <div class="inner">

    <!-- Top row (rotated 180°): [Page 3] [Page 4] [Page 5] [Page 6] -->
    <div class="cell rotated">
      <div class="panel">
        <h3>Page 6 – …</h3>
        <div class="body">…content for page 6…</div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="cell rotated">
      <div class="panel">
        <h3>Page 5 – …</h3>
        <div class="body">…content for page 5…</div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="cell rotated">
      <div class="panel">
        <h3>Page 4 – …</h3>
        <div class="body">…content for page 4…</div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="cell rotated">
      <div class="panel">
        <h3>Page 3 – …</h3>
        <div class="body">…content for page 3…</div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Bottom row (upright): [Back Cover] [Front Cover] [Page 1] [Page 2] -->
    <div class="cell">
      <div class="panel">
        <h3>Back Cover</h3>
        <div class="body">Contact / credits</div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="cell">
      <div class="panel">
        <h3>Front Cover</h3>
        <div class="body">Title / art<br><img src="cover.jpg" alt="cover"></div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="cell">
      <div class="panel">
        <h3>Page 1 – …</h3>
        <div class="body">…content for page 1…</div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="cell">
      <div class="panel">
        <h3>Page 2 – …</h3>
        <div class="body">…content for page 2…</div>
      </div>
    </div>

  </div>
</div>

```
